mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.shangjia_id as shangjiaId ,a.jingdian_name as jingdianName ,a.jingdian_uuid_number as jingdianUuidNumber ,a.jingdian_photo as jingdianPhoto ,a.jingdian_video as jingdianVideo ,a.jingdian_address as jingdianAddress ,a.zan_number as zanNumber ,a.cai_number as caiNumber ,a.jingdian_types as jingdianTypes ,a.jingdian_kucun_number as jingdianKucunNumber ,a.jingdian_old_money as jingdianOldMoney ,a.jingdian_new_money as jingdianNewMoney ,a.jingdian_clicknum as jingdianClicknum ,a.jingdian_content as jingdianContent ,a.shangxia_types as shangxiaTypes ,a.jingdian_delete as jingdianDelete ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
